name: Shooting Star Railway
description:
Shooting Star Railway is an intergalactic (literally) on-rails First-Person Shooter, in which you are the conductor of the Shooting Star Railway, and your goal is simple: outrun the massive black hole behind you!

Collect scrap metal and cosmic crystals to upgrade your train with more cars and get more fuel to escape the event horizon!

CONTROLS:

WSAD - Move

Space - Jump

E - Start/Stop Train

Q - Purchase Menu

Right Click - Tractor-Beam/Grab Materials

Left Click - Shoot Raygun

Presented by Team Cosmonaut:

Lead Programmer - Zach Thanstrom

Lead Artist - London Sawyer

Lead Composer & SFX Artist - Robert Becerra
